column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Being in the service industry it is ridiculous that a person like this is a manager of a restaurant let alone be a busboy and the server has an attitude even after screwing up an order. Its the culture of this place and I would stand astounded if it remains in business if an even half decent place opens around the neighborhood. You should absolutely go if you like being treated like dirt. Really sad because we have been long time customers.
